'''Duncan''' is a man who was trapped in an MRI when Pac-North was bombed.

==History==
Duncan was at Pacific Northwest General Hospital getting an MRI when there was an explosion and the tech monitoring him left screaming, leaving him trapped in the MRI. While clearing the building, Travis and Ben came upon Duncan and said they'd get him free. The machine was jammed, so they had to pull him out manually. He began to panic as they struggled to get him out, so Ben and Travis talked to him to calm him down. They were finally able to move the tray back and get Duncan out of the hospital.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to a woman named Carla. Before they got married, he cheated on her. He says it was just one night and he's always regretted it.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He weighs around 250 pounds.
